RapidFit:
//================================================ // Formal Parameters to be fitted or fixed
F_s 0.0 0. 0.5 Fixed Unitless
delta_s 8.8e-01 Fixed Unitless
Csp 1.0 Fixed Unitless
// True Physics Parameters for signal
gamma 0.66 0.6 0.75 Free ps^{-1}
deltaGamma 0.09 0.01 0.18 Free ps^{-1}
Aperp_sq 0.15 0. 0.5 Free Unitless
Azero_sq 0.59 Free 0. 0.8 Unitless
delta_para 2.4 0.05 6.3 -6.3 Free Unitless
delta_perp -0.2 -6.3 6.3 0.05 Free Unitless
delta_zero 0.0 -3.3 3.3 Fixed Unitless
deltaM 1.77655e+01 Free ps-1
Phi_s -0.035 Free Unitless
lambda 1.0 Fixed Unitless
//.................................. // Detector Parameters
// Resolution Model
timeResolutionScale 1.8 Fixed
// Mistag parameters
// Mistag calibration
mistagP1_OS 1.0 Fixed
mistagP0_OS 0.0 Fixed
mistagSetPoint_OS 0.0 Fixed
mistagDeltaP1_OS 0.0 Fixed
mistagDeltaP0_OS 0.0 Fixed
mistagDeltaSetPoint_OS 0.0 Fixed
// Mistag calibration
mistagP1_SS 1.0 Fixed
mistagP0_SS 0.0 Fixed
mistagSetPoint_SS 0.0 Fixed
mistagDeltaP1_SS 0.0 Fixed
mistagDeltaP0_SS 0.0 Fixed
mistagDeltaSetPoint_SS 0.0 Fixed
beta 0.0
Fixed
//========================================== // Specify which minimiser to use.
Minuit 100000 0.01 0 #MinosErrors #NoHesse
sWeight NegativeLogLikelihoodThreaded 16 False #True True
1
//========================================== // Specify the fit
//................................... // This applies a constraint on deltaM
deltaM 17.768 0.024
// This applies a constraint on mistag scale # # # # # mistagP1_OS # 0.982 # 0.035 # # # mistagP0_OS # 0.0062 # 0.0044 # # # mistagDeltaP0_OS # 0.014 # 0.0012 # # # mistagDeltaP1_OS # 0.066 # 0.012 # # #
# # # # mistagP1_SS # 0.976 # 0.18 # # # mistagP0_SS # 0.005 # 0.005 # # # mistagDeltaP0_SS # -0.0158 # 0.0014 # # # mistagDeltaP1_SS # 0.007 # 0.0111 # # #
//=============================================================================================== //=============================================================================================== //=============================================================================================== //=============================================================================================== // The commonpdf and phase space to all segments
Bs2JpsiPhi_Signal_v8 UseHelicityBasis:True AngularAcceptanceFile:2014-3fbAnalysis/angAccWeights_psi2s_2011.root AngularAcceptanceIgnoreNumerator:True UseTimeAcceptance:True UseEventResolution:True useNewMistagModel:True ResolutionModel:ResolutionModel useMultiplePhis:False
time 0.3 14.0 ps
helcosthetaK -1.0 1.0
helphi (helphi+TMath::Pi()-(helphi>0.)*(2.*TMath::Pi())) -3.1416 3.1416 rad
helcosthetaL -1.0 1.0
tagdecision_os tagdecision_os_cb 1. 0. -1.
tagdecision_ss tagdecision_ss_nn 1. 0. -1.
tagomega_os tagomega_os_cb 0. 0.5
tagomega_ss tagomega_ss_nn 0. 0.5
eventResolution sigmat 0.0 0.12
sWeight track_weight -100000 100000
unbiased triggerDecisionUnbiased 0.0 1.0
biased triggerDecisionBiasedExcl 0.0 1.0
